name: Common Cold
description: A viral infection that affects the upper respiratory tract

name: Flu
description: A contagious respiratory illness caused by the influenza virus

name: Allergies
description: An overreaction of the immune system to a foreign substance

name: Asthma
description: A chronic inflammatory disease that affects the airways

name: Bronchitis
description: An inflammation of the bronchial tubes that carry air to and from the lungs

name: Pneumonia
description: An infection that inflames the air sacs in the lungs

name: Tuberculosis
description: A bacterial infection that primarily affects the lungs

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure that can lead to heart disease and stroke

name: Diabetes
description: A metabolic disorder that affects blood sugar levels

name: Arthritis
description: A condition that causes inflammation and pain in the joints
